BG3 Gloom Stalker Tips & Builds

Gloom stalkers were those rangers that felt more at home in the dark and gloomy places of the Realms. They stood bravely in the face of dangers that originated from the dark, protecting innocents from those umbral threats. Notes, Tips, and other Trivia for the Gloom Stalker s
